title: For sale or trade: OJ Tip O'Neill and several scarce player postcards
author: timn1

posts.post_title: For sale or trade: OJ Tip O'Neill and several scarce player postcards
posts.post_content:
reasonable offers considered.  Would gladly trade any of these toward my wants in early player postcard sets, including but not limited to:

American Lg. Publishing Co.
Detroit Free Press PCs
Rotograph
Ullman
Cubs/White Sox (Suhling)
Hull White Sox 
Pirates Vignette PCs
Souvenir Shop of Cleveland
Wolverine (Jennings "Manager" only)

Let me know what you have!


My external email is [url]apspr@msn.com[/url]


N172 Tip O’Neill  SGC 30   #363-9A  SOLD

Wolverine Detroit Postcards Sam Crawford bunting HOF SGC 40/3
VCP shows NO sales of this card since 2006.  $475

American League Publishing Co. Postcards Harry Bemis 
RARE SGC 20/1.5   $500

1908 Suhling Cubs Postcards Frank Chance HOF RARE SGC 50     $900
Highest graded Chance; in fact, no card in the whole set has been graded higher (2 other SGC50s)

1908 Suhling Cubs Postcards Ed Reulbach RARE SGC 35    $350
Highest graded Reulbach (of 4 total)

M101-3 Sporting News Eddie Collins HOF PSA 1    $220

Rose Postcard Corridon SGC 30 - beautiful for the grade: SOLD
